sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨介入治疗儿童股骨头缺血性坏死的价值。

sentences.english: We used a submaximal effort tourniquet test to induce ischemic pain.
sentences.chinese: 我们使用了亚努力止血带试验诱发缺血性疼痛。

sentences.english: Objective To further discuss the indexes which can be used to objectively appraise the rat myocardial ischemia models.
sentences.chinese: 目的进一步探讨客观评价大鼠心肌缺血模型的指标。

sentences.english: RESULTS Ischemia enhanced cell proliferation in DG of adult rats.
sentences.chinese: 结果缺血性脑损伤可促进成年大鼠齿状回的细胞增殖。

sentences.english: Objective To study the protective effects of Hsy on experimental rats with cerebral ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究红花黄色素对实验性脑缺血大鼠的保护作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the protective effects of maltol(MT) on cerebral ischemia and reperfusion damages in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究麦芽醇对大鼠脑缺血再灌注损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: Normal saline in the same volume was perfused in the ischemiareperfusion group and sham operation group.
sentences.chinese: 缺血再灌注组和假手术组灌等体积的生理盐水。

sentences.english: Objective Explore the biochemical mechanism of actions of Jiangguiyin capsules against myocardial ischemia and reperfusion injury.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜桂饮胶囊抗心肌缺血的生化机理。

sentences.english: Objective To comparatively study two model-making of cerebral infarction in the territory of middle cerebral artery in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究比较两种局灶性脑缺血模型的制作。

sentences.english: Nimodipine could prevent the calcium overload in ischemic myocyte.
sentences.chinese: 尼莫地平能阻止缺血心肌细胞钙超载的发展和加重。

sentences.english: Finally, we found no association between the incidence of AVN and operation delay.
sentences.chinese: 最后我们没有发现手术耽搁和缺血性坏死之间的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To treat ischemia of the lower extremity, endarterectomy was performed.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨动脉内膜剥脱术治疗下肢缺血性疾病。

sentences.english: Postischemic recovery of coronary flow in group B was significantly reduced compared with group A.
sentences.chinese: 组缺血后冠状动脉流量的恢复显著低于A组。

sentences.english: Evaluate the anti-action of Aprotinin in ischemic brain edema.
sentences.chinese: 评价抑肽酶对缺血性脑水肿的抑制作用。

sentences.english: The bovine hearts blocked at the left anterior descending artery for 45 minutes are made as an ischemic model.
sentences.chinese: 阻断牛心脏前降支动脉45分钟作为缺血心肌模型。

sentences.english: Conclusion:Siwu Decoction is safe and effective in asymptomatic myocardial ischemia.
sentences.chinese: 结论四物汤配方颗粒治疗无症状心肌缺血安全有效。
